verses.name: 2 Chronicles 20:31
verses.text: And Jehoshaphat reigned over Judah: he was thirty and five years old when he began to reign, and he reigned twenty and five years in Jerusalem. And his mother’s name was Azubah the daughter of Shilhi.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 20:32
verses.text: And he walked in the way of Asa his father, and departed not from it, doing that which was right in the sight of the Lord.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 20:33
verses.text: Howbeit the high places were not taken away: for as yet the people had not prepared their hearts unto the God of their fathers.
